links: P. De Geest, Palindromic Quasi_Over_Squares of the form n^2+(n+X)
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n)=A000217(n-2)+A000217(n+2) for n>0. - _Jon Perry_, Jul 23 2003a(n)=2*n+a(n-1)-2 (with a(1)=4) - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010
author: _Patrick De Geest_
